casebody.data:
No. 10-6725. Mark Norton, Petitioner v. Brian Coleman, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Fayette, et al. 562 U.S. 1034, 131 S. Ct. 578, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8720.

178 L. Ed. 2d 422,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
